topics.body:
so guys i been having this thoughts lately that drive me crazy

yall know how much i love hip hop right? its probably the thing i lvoe the most, specially the instrumentals, well iÂ´ve been thinking, maybe being a lawyer aint my thing, like im not cut out for that, that im gonna be mediocre since is not a thing i really really love.

then i though hey, maybe i can me an electronic musuic producer, i mean i love lectronic music in hip hop and other medias, so much i listen to them carefully and memorize them.

but then i think, would that really give me a future? will i get money out of that? or is just a thing for lazy bums who cant expect to be something in life.

and i dont even know what my parents gonna say. fuck.
